fields.Title: Helen - EasterEggs / Pleasure Wheel / Flow – PLAZA ORB / viscal pleasure wheel intro
fields.Description: Viscal intro after WCW quest not taken

fields.Dialogue Text: You should return to the boardwalk once the body has been taken away. There's something you need to see.
Let's call it an apparition from the past.
Say no more! I'll go -- shrouded in total mystery.
You can just stop by whenever you're close. It should be quick enough.
Oh no, it's one of those 'show, don't tell' things, isn't it?
Come on, I'm going to need more here.
A little something that your visual cortex has put together while you were busy solving the case.
